item.description:
Update

The time of the movie is 7:35. I will arrive around 6:45, and will be wearing my red trucker's cap with the meetup logo. We'll go in and get seats around 7:10 minutes before showtime; we have a much better chance of sitting together if we do that. If the movie is upstairs, I'll be waiting by the tables by the big window in the second floor lobby, and if it's downstairs I'll be behind the ropes across from the refreshment stand. Note that to get to the upstairs lobby, you have to buy a ticket.

Original Post

Check it out, another film version of the Conan character, this one at least trying to stay true to

the original stories written almost a century ago.

If you miss the group before the movie, no worries, you can meet us after. We gather outside the doors of the room showing the movie afterwards. Then we head out for some munchies and drinkies.

I strongly encourage folks to buy tickets ahead of time at fandango.com.

 

 

Synopsis

"I live. I love. I slay... I am content."

- Conan The Barbarian

The most legendary Barbarian of all time is back this Summer. Having thrived and evolved for eight consecutive decades in the public imagination - in prose and graphics, on the big screen and small, in games and properties of all kinds- Conan's exploits in the Hyborian Age now come alive like never before in a colossal 3D action-adventure film.

A quest that begins as a personal vendetta for the fierce Cimmerian warrior soon turns into an epic battle against hulking rivals, horrific monsters, and impossible odds, as Conan realizes he is the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from an encroaching reign of supernatural evil.

Deftly adapted from the original works of Robert E. Howard and faithful to the mythology and psychology of his iconic character, "Conan the Barbarian" stars Jason Momoa, Rachel Nichols, Stephen Lang, Rose McGowan, Said Taghmaoui and Ron Perlman. The film is directed by Marcus Nispel, and written by Thomas Dean Donnelly & Joshua Oppenheimer and Sean Hood. 

 

Trailers 'n' Stuff

item.name: Conan the Barbarian
